topComments.author: Fire Bride
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amo esse parque!! √ìtimo lugar para todas as suas aventuras ao ar livre. Os pavilh√µes s√£o espa√ßosos, limpos e muito bem conservados. Sendo t√£o grande, pensei que seria tranquilo √† noite, no entanto, voc√™ podia ouvir os carros correndo para cima e para baixo na Pines Blvd, sendo o bairro as festas do parque at√© o √∫ltimo minuto do hor√°rio da ordenan√ßa de ru√≠do. The playgrounds are nice and clean for the kids  2. Safety town as most of them at other parks need some TLC but in general is a good pretend play area.  3. The RV campground is okay. Shaded spots are hit and miss. Don't think they have a laundry on site. Being so big i thought it would be quiet at night however, you could hear the cars racing up and down pines blvd, the neighborhood being the park parties until last minute of noise ordinance time. (Original) We went to the water park. The pipeline is closed. But the kids had fun in the other parts of the water park. We went early so we were able to get some shade, but this is very hard to achieve if you are not an early bird. A very good activity for the summer. And the prices are reasonable.

topComments.author: Jason Beck

topComments.author: Gabby Leon
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Paradise Cove n√£o parece nada do que costumava ser. topComments.author: Annette Schafer
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Gostei muito do parque. Como estava aberto apenas por uma semana, nas f√©rias de primavera, os grandes tobo√°guas estavam fechados - o que √© compreens√≠vel. Eu dei a este lugar apenas quatro estrelas - n√£o por causa deles, mas porque considero que √© um local familiar - havia algumas mulheres vestidas inadequadamente com seus T&A espalhados por todo o lugar. Meio que me deixou desconfort√°vel por ter meu filho de dez anos l√° fora.  (Original) I really enjoyed the park. Because it was only open for one week, spring break, the big water slides were closed-which is understandable. I gave this place only four stars-not because of them but because I consider it to be a family venue- there were quite a few inappropriately dressed women with their T&A hanging out all over the place. Kind of made me uncomfortable to have my ten-year-old boy out there.

topComments.author: Maria Cuenca

Very disappointing. Will not be coming back to this park again.

topComments.author: mcharter5430
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o fa√ßa uma festa aqui! REpito que N√ÉO fa√ßa a festa de anivers√°rio do seu filho aqui. Voc√™ vai se ferrar! A gest√£o deste lugar √© rid√≠cula e pouco profissional. Voc√™ n√£o pode reservar funbrellas com anteced√™ncia (apenas 1¬∫ vem 1¬∫ servir) e depois de esperar na fila por 2 horas para o parque aqu√°tico abrir (10h e n√£o 8h), eles disseram a todos que n√£o havia funbrellas dispon√≠veis para aluguel porque um parque vizinho (TY Park ) fechou e eles tiveram que honrar suas reservas. Havia muita gente chateada e superlota√ß√£o para lidar j√° √†s 10h50. Poupe uma dor de cabe√ßa e pesadelo, v√° √† praia ou a um lugar onde voc√™ possa fazer uma reserva se estiver planejando uma festa. Se n√£o, prepare-se para lidar com todas as cadeiras sendo ocupadas por pessoas que tentam economizar vagas para os convidados da festa, pois n√£o t√™m uma maneira adequada de garantir um processo de reserva justo e igual para todos.  (Original) Do not have a party here! I REPEAT DO NOT have your child‚Äôs birthday party here. You will be screwed! This place‚Äôs  management is ridiculous and unprofessional. You cannot reserve funbrellas in advance (only 1st come 1st serve) and after waiting in line for 2 hours for the water park to open (10am not 8am), they told everyone there were no funbrellas available for rent because a neighboring park (TY Park) shut down and they had to honor their reservations. There were a lot of upset people and overcrowded ness to deal with as early as 10:50am. Save yourself a headache and nightmare, just go to the beach or a place you can actually have a reservation if your planning a party. If not get ready to deal with all chairs being filled by people trying to save spots for their party guests since they have no adequate way of ensuring a fair and equal reservation process for all.

I believe it's more of a money issue and having to hire employees to be able to work the slide I just don't understand this park used to be so good.
